title: Glyphs & Ligatures
content:
I want to learn and understand how to use ligatures and glyphs better.

Does anyone know of a helpful book, a guide or an article?

Thanks for the help!
author: animal

comments.content:
If you're looking for good reference to about micro-typography (which would encompass how to use ligatures and other odd characters) you want Elements of Typographic Style by Robert Bringhurst.

[http://www.amazon.com/Elements-Typographic-Style-Robert-Bringhurst/dp/08...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184305/http:/www.amazon.com/Elements-Typographic-Style-Robert-Bringhurst/dp/0881791326 "http://www.amazon.com/Elements-Typographic-Style-Robert-Bringhurst/dp/0881791326")
